name: html-pdf-generator
description: NodeJs plugin to generate PDF from HTML template using Vuejs and puppeteer

scripts.build2npm: cd ../compiled/ && npm i --production && npm run run-gulp
scripts.config: npm run build2npm && npm run start
scripts.pack: npm test && cd ../compiled/ && npm i --production && npm run run-pack
scripts.publish: npm run pack && cd ../compiled/ && npm run run-publish
